channel.title: ScullyScape
channel.description:
[left]Hey everyone this is my first development thread as this will be my first server I take seriously as I work on it.
I'm sure you'll all be glad to hear that my base is not Delta, I'm just as fed up with Delta servers as all of you. The base i will be using is AJ-Scape's which can be found here: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363282.0.html]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363282.0.html[/url].
[s]Things to do:
-Put in decent shops -Remove the 100's of pointless global objects -Fix Player and NPC facing during combat -Remove thread per client -Add Graham's event manager -Add a few mini-games -Make the skills as realistic as i can -Work on decreasing the size of the client class
Client class starting size: 1.7mb Client class current size: 1.03mb
I removed all the skills. Skills: Combat-60% Magic-45% Ranged-50% Prayer- 0% Runecrafting- 10% Agility- 0% Herblore- 0% Thieving- 0% Crafting- 0% Fletching- 0% Slayer- 0% Mining- 0% Smithing- 0% Fishing- 0% Cooking- 0% Firemaking- 0% Woodcutting- 0% Farming- 0%
Keep in mind this isn't going to be a server that has 100,000,000 commands, a clumped together skilling area, or designated spots to train combat. That kind of server makes me angry to even look at to be honest. [/s]
May 15, 2009: -Started with Shard Revolutions -Added adding xp upon hit -Added correct starting levels -Added a custom quest "Getting Started"

item.title: ScullyScape
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

Yeah I did, I don’t plan on clumping a bunch of things together or having a crappy Delta leech. That shit bugs me just as much as you guys.

Read full topic

item.title: ScullyScape
item.dc:creator: @Scully Scully
item.description:
@Scully wrote:

[quote=“jc22493, post:11, topic:275248”][quote author=Scully link=topic=363615.msg2761984#msg2761984 date=1240599127]

12 hours should be enough to upload a 20kb picture of your development; and if you haven’t achieved anything why bother posting.

Sure lemme post a picture of some deleted objects and the size of the client reduced. Great deal done so far isn’t it?
I’ll post pictures or videos when I do something related to skills or whatnot.
[/quote]
I PK Pigeons is talking about improving and cleaning out the source. By cleaning out, he does not mean deleting a few NPC’s and global objects.[/quote]

I wasn’t replying to PK Pigeons, I was replying to Psycotix.

Read full topic

item.title: ScullyScape
item.dc:creator: @I_PK_Pigeons I PK Pigeons
item.description:
@I_PK_Pigeons wrote:

Psycotix:

Why does every hate it when people use DeltaScape sources?

Cuz it be da deltaskap revolution!!!1
&& Nobody bothers to fix the shit timers which makes combat complete bull, and all the skills that are in it are done half assed.
Then when people release that crap, its the same shit, with custom items added, and a new home.

There’s nothing original anymore, then people some this allstar crap which is supposed to be original, when it provides no challenge what so ever.

Deltascape is fucking everywhere, that’s why it has a lot of hate towards it, then when someone posts something like allstar, nobody’s interested because its a bunch of npc’s clumped together and something they like to call a skill zone.

With private servers these days, you can’t win.

Read full topic

We all use Java why don’t we hate Java? -(That’s something some of us have tried to change for a while now) but I would post some pictures atleast if you’re showing-off development.[/quote]
I haven’t done anything yet i posted this thread a little over 12 hours ago what’s there to show for development so far?

Read full topic

item.title: ScullyScape
item.dc:creator: @Psycotix Psycotix
item.description:
@Psycotix wrote:

DeltaScape isn’t based off of Project Czar…
I’ve already told you this before, and even Kihomura says it’s off Devolution:

Also you got it wrong, Project Czar is based from ElionScape which is based from PimpScape.

Read full topic

item.title: ScullyScape
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

[quote=“Psycotix, post:3, topic:275248”]Why does every hate it when people use DeltaScape sources?
We all use Java why don’t we hate Java? -(That’s something some of us have tried to change for a while now) but I would post some pictures atleast if you’re showing-off development.[/quote]

You really dont understand…

Delta is based from Project Czar which is based from Pimpscape which finnally is based from wL. Winter Love server was horribly made and ate cpu and ram. Since the flooding of even more crap through 3 bases; Delta has to be the worst! Theres nothing wrong with Java if you start correctly.
Note: AJ Scape is definatly wL so its horrible.

Sorry about Mistake

Read full topic

@Scully wrote:

[left]Hey everyone this is my first development thread as this will be my first server I take seriously as I work on it.

I’m sure you’ll all be glad to hear that my base is not Delta, I’m just as fed up with Delta servers as all of you. The base i will be using is AJ-Scape’s which can be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363282.0.html.

-Put in decent shops
-Remove the 100’s of pointless global objects

-Remove thread per client
-Add Graham’s event manager

-Make the skills as realistic as i can

Client class starting size: 1.7mb
Client class current size: 1.03mb

I removed all the skills.

Combat-60%

Keep in mind this isn’t going to be a server that has 100,000,000 commands, a clumped together skilling area, or designated spots to train combat. That kind of server makes me angry to even look at to be honest.
